Author: bunchofbroccoli
Text: I have the same thoughts sometimes. They're not positive :( Mostly I want to have short or buzzed hair but it means I have to stay underweight.

Author: eggmanea
Text: I’ve been thinking of cutting my hair, but tbh go for it. You can def rock the look, and if it motivates you to be healthier, why not. At the very least, your hair will grow back healthier ☺️
